newsitem.title: USA: Bradlees names Peter Thorner CEO.
newsitem.headline: Bradlees names Peter Thorner CEO.

text.p: Bradlees Inc said Tuesday its board of directors had appointed Peter Thorner as the company's chairman and chief executive officer, effective immediately.
Thorner will succeed Mark Cohen, who has resigned, the company said.
The company said Thorner became its president and chief operating officer in June 1995 and member of the board of directors the following month.
Bradlees operates 110 discount department stores in Maine, New Hampshire, Massachusetts, Connecticut, New York, New Jersey and Pennsylvania
